nodes.text: Ihouse was an establishment in a seedy part of the Coruscant underworld, situated next to Purple Werm and across the street from Sleeping Rose. An Aurebesh neon sign spelled out the name.
During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment opposite Ihouse, while planning the Mission to the Jedi Temple.
During pre-production, the establishment was known as "Gala", as seen in concept art of the Coruscant underworld.
